ComicInfo.Title: Meeting Cute, Fucking Cuter; El Show Super Duper Sensacional Fantastico de Doralis; The Goddess and the Goof; Buen Viaje, Socorro
ComicInfo.Summary:
Meditations on the meaning of Karma as Khamo helps the police bust some drug dealers.
Fritz tries to set Petra up with Hector. Hector wants to stay with Fritz, but relents as she's open about her other relationships. The meeting with Petra leaves Hector considering his options.
Petra hears that her ex- is getting remarried. This preys on her mind when she goes on a dinner-date with Hector. She then takes him away on holiday and sleeps with him. Hector is falling for her so much he is agonising about whether or not to tell her he slept with Fritz.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:01:48. [Issue ID 627957]
